reference.title: cxxTypedef module
reference.shortdesc: Defines a top-level container for all the elements necessary to describe an C++ API typedef.

section.title: Description
section.p: The <cxxTypedef> topic type contains elements necessary to show the name of the typedef, the typedef syntax, and the typedef use description. This topic type module also contains all the elements necessary to describe the component variables and functions.
The cxxTypedef topic contains the following elements:
